data.title: Nippon Care Supply (TSE:2393) Profit Growth Surges 23%, Reinforcing Bullish Margin Narratives

Current profit margins rose to 6.2% from 5.5% last year, and the companyâ€™s consistent profit gains over five years underscore the high-quality nature of current earnings.
